title: Create model knowledge cutoff reference
description: Document Claude 4 (Opus 4.1 and Sonnet 4.5) knowledge cutoff and capabilities. Create reference file listing what Claude knows natively vs what requires web search/grounding. Include guidelines for when to use Gemini MCP for current information. Add model self-identification strings.
notes: HIGH PRIORITY - Simple but important reference. Include exact model IDs and API strings.
